messages.content:
📌 Continuum (Classes 8–12)
🗓️ Sunday, 17th August 2025 | ⏰ 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM
🎯 Format: Live Dialogue with Painting

ℹ️ An interdisciplinary event where participants present a dialogue about Picasso’s Guernica while creating live paintings.

📖 Sample Rules:
• Two members speak on Guernica; all three paint simultaneously.
• Only wax crayons and markers allowed.
• No costumes or props except 2 hats, 2 empty frames, 2 umbrellas.
...

🏆 Awards: Top 3 Teams, Critic’s Choice Award...
